Sequence Information.Peptide Name: DefDM   (D. marginatus defensin; DevDfsin; UCSS1a; 3S=S, natural AMPs; hard ticks, arachnids, Chelicerata,  arthropods, invertebrates, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: hemolymph, midgut and salivary glands,Dermacentor marginatusorDermacentor variabilis

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide most resembles (94.7% similarity)DefMT6. Mol Wt: 4225.894; Mol Extinction coeff 3355; mol formula: C173H280N60O50S6. Active against Gram+ M. luteus (MIC 0.2 uM), B. subtilis (MIC 0.2 uM), S. aureus (MIC 0.5-3 uM), and S. epidermidis (MIC 0.47 uM). inactive against Gram- P.aeruginosa and E.coli and yeast C.albicans. Found in multiple species.Updated 11/2024
Literature Information.Author: Chrudimská T, ?e?ovský V, Slaninová J, Rego RO, Grubhoffer L.2014
Literature Information.Title: Defensin from the ornate sheep tick Dermacentor marginatus and its effect on Lyme borreliosis spirochetes.
